1.content:
You were currently in one of your school’s science rooms. You had wanted to create something that would make a human much stronger. If you were able to complete the potion, mankind would benefit a lot from it. Though you have failed time and time again, you were determined to get it right.

“Are you sure this is what you want?” A voice suddenly said behind you. You quickly turned around to see a strange hooded man you had never seen before. He was tall, but you couldn’t make out much of his face.

“What?” You asked, having no idea where he came from.

“Your project…It is extremely dangerous and goes against the laws of nature. Do you wish to continue? I shall warn you, there will be a cost.” The man said. You nodded with confidence, making him sigh. The stranger then suddenly handed you a plant, one you had never seen before. “Add this to the potion, and you will succeed. But remember my warning.” The stranger said before turning to leave. You looked at your project and started to turn back to the man when you suddenly realized he had vanished.

You shook it off, but used the plant he gave you. Within a few minutes, your potion changed to a different color.

“So, if he’s right then this should make me stronger. But…how did he even know about my project? I only told my teacher and family, and even then I told them to keep it a secret.” You asked yourself quietly. You shrugged it off and took the potion. Though nothing happened, you figured you would feel the effects later. You turned to leave the room.
1.title: A strange man with a solution to your project

11.content:
You stand there waiting for the effects of the potion to kick in but nothing happens. You expected to feel a surge running though your body or get a severe headache but nothing. You walk over to one of the desk, being stronger sounded great so you want to put that to the test. You go to pick up the desk but struggle, it just feels like a normal desk.

"Dam it." You sigh.

You look over at the remains at the potion and it looks perfectly normal. Rushing over to it you can't help but think that something is wrong, there is has been no effects yet. It's been fifteen minutes and still nothing.

"Calm down," You say to yourself. "It could be a delayed effect."

You go back to the desk and pick up you books skimming though a few pages to get your mind off the potion. While it is a concern of yours for the potion to work you need to reassure yourself that it could take a bit.

To get your mind off the the potion you....

112.content:
You decide to go to the locker room to pick up your gym gear from before, seeing as you had to go home soon. As you entered the Boys locker room, you start to feel your skin tingle.

All of a sudden, you pass out, and when you wake up, you’re about the size of a running shoe in height, about 5 inches tall. You start freaking out and running to a wall, before you realize how quick you’re going.

Suddenly, it hits you. This is what the ingredient the man added did, it made you superhuman, but for the price of your size. Now that you’ve calmed down a bit, you think about what to do next, considering you’re in a room where people change.

You decide to _________.

A: Stay in the boys locker room (You’re gay)
B: Go to the girls locker room (Straight)
C: Try finding your sister to either get you home or so you can perv on them. (You’re into incest)

Even though you were pretty sure you would be able to defend against a sinister giant, you decided to head to the girl’s locker room to avoid having to see a guy strip. When you entered the room, you ran behind a trash can and started to hide for the moment. You looked around the room to see a lot of sexy women. Some of them looked like they were getting ready for their next class, some of them were getting ready for gym. There was even a couple completely bare, taking showers. You were now conflicted. Part of you wanted to get one of their attention to get their help (due to your small size) and part of you wanted to continue being a pervert. It was also difficult to think straight due to the exposed bodies in view. After a minute of thinking…

12.content:
On your way home, you thought about what you could do once the potion took effect. You smiled at the thought of your girlfriend being a bit rougher on you. There were a lot of things you could do with your new abilities.

Once you got home, you dropped the bag down and sat on the couch. You turned on the tv and sighed, feeling a bit tired. You hadn’t realized how long the day was. You went into the kitchen and grabbed a cup of water, bringing it back to the couch before sitting down. You noticed that you were starting to struggle with understanding what they were saying on the tv. You took a drink of water and placed the cup down.

“Why am I suddenly so tired?” You asked yourself. Your vision started to blur out. Before you knew it, you collapsed on the couch. “Why was I so dumb? That guy could have given me poison.” You said before passing out.

You eventually woke up in a very dark place. You felt exposed and you weren’t entirely sure why. You walked out of your dark location to find out you were naked.

“What?! Where are my…” You said, turning around. Your clothes were now giant sized and no longer fit you. You suddenly realized you had shrunk. However, it did make you curious. You tried to jump to the table, which was pretty far away now. You landed perfectly on the table. “My abilities! They’ve improved.…the cost! That’s what he meant.” You said, face palming. You jumped to the floor, perfectly safe. “I should try to get someone’s attention. Although I am a bit hungry.” You said to yourself. You started running to the kitchen, finding out your speed was like a cheetah’s speed now.

121.content:
You get to the kitchen with ease and look around. At first, you thought about getting food from the fridge. However, you dismissed the idea because you were worried you might get trapped in there. You may be stronger now, but that doesn’t mean your invincible.

You started to climb towards the counter. It wasn’t too bad for you and it didn’t take you long. Once you got to the top, you saw a package of cookies. You opened it and started to chow down. You ate a few, enjoying the taste before burping.

After eating a few, you spotted a bag of Cheetos and decided to have some. After climbing into the bag and eating some, your belly started to expand a little from filling it so much. You however noticed you were getting a lot of Cheeto dust on you, practically turning you orange. If you weren’t careful, you could be mistaken for a Cheeto. Despite this, you continued to eat until…

13.content:
You immediately went to your girlfriend’s house. Once you gained your new strengths, you knew Emily would love to have a lot of fun. You soon reached her place and knocked on her door. It wasn’t long before Emily answered, smiling.

“Oh Zack! What a pleasant surprise, come in.” She said, gesturing to inside. You smiled and entered. “So what can I do for my faithful servant?”

“I completed something I think you’ll like. Let’s just say that in a little bit, I’ll be even more useful to you.” You tell her. Emily smiles and kisses you.

“I can’t wait. In the meantime, why don’t I get you something to eat.” She said, leaving the room. As she left, you suddenly felt dizzy and pretty tired. At first, you just thought it had been a long day, but you suddenly grew more tired.

“Emily…” You tried to say before passing out. It wasn’t long before you woke up on the floor. You stood up only to realize you had shrunk. You then noticed your clothes hadn’t shrunk with you, leaving you exposed as your clothes sat on the couch. As you thought about what to do…

131.content:
The ground trembled as the bare-footed giantess approached. You hid under the table, hoping your discarded clothes would help give Emily an idea that something happened. The giantess came closer and immediately noticed the random clothes on the floor. Confused, she placed the plate on the table and picked up your pants. After looking around for a moment, Emily smiled, making you a little worried.

“I’m not sure why, but I suppose this means he’s around here naked. How interesting, if he wants to leave, he’ll have to come get his clothes, which means I get to see my personal servant exposed.” Emily said quietly, though you were able to hear her. She sat down and turned on the tv. “I’ll patiently wait for him. Sooner or later, he’ll have to approach me.”

As you looked up at her, you knew she was correct. You would have to get her attention at some point. However, you weren’t worried. If you were able to hear her at this distance, then that meant the potion worked and you’re abilities had increased. You got close to her foot. Though it didn’t smell very pleasant, you still liked the smell a little. You looked up to see Emily hadn’t noticed you.

132.content:
Annie entered the room and looked around, believing she heard you come inside. She quickly noticed your clothes on the couch and inspected them. It didn’t take long for her to find you, lifting your tiny body to her face. Her eyes widened as she realized it was you.

“Zack!” Annie exclaimed. “How…why are you so small?” She asked. You explained that you made a potion that increased your abilities, but your shrinking was an unintentional side effect.

“I was going to tell Emily before I suddenly shrunk down. Please Annie, take me to her.” You asked nicely.

“You’re so cute Zack, but…” Annie started to say. She wasn’t sure what to do. The angel on her shoulder was telling her to do as you said and take you to her sister. However, the demon on her shoulder was telling her to keep you to herself. After all, she did have a crush on you and was jealous of what you did for Emily.

“Annie?” You asked, seeing her distressed face. After a moment…

15.content:
As you walk home, you thought about what your mother would say when you told her your project was finally completed. However, as you walked, you suddenly felt a bit dizzy. You sat down on a bench and looked around. There wasn’t anybody to help you, which worried you a little. Before you could do anything, you suddenly passed out.

When you woke up, you found yourself under the bench, except you had suddenly shrunk! Your clothes hadn’t shrunk with you, meaning you were now naked. You climbed onto the bench to find out everything you had with you was now gone.

“Oh what am I going to do. So I guess my abilities have improved, but out here I’m just food for a bird. I know it!” You said to yourself.

“Perhaps I could help.” A feminine voice said behind you. You turned around to see a giant woman staring at you. She had long black hair and green eyes. The woman also had black lipstick on and a shirt that left her bellybutton exposed. She picked you up and smiled. “Aren’t you a rare specimen. So small…and cute.” She said, making you blush.

“Can you help me? Someone took my things and I need to get home.” You explained. You then told her about what’s you were capable of, leaving out the part about the potion you were able to make.

“Of course I’ll help. Don’t worry, I’ll take you somewhere safe.” The woman said, though you noticed she was giving you some sort of look. As the woman carried you, she didn’t stop smiling. The woman took you to…
15.title: A mysterious woman

info.brief_description: You shrink down to 3 inches but your abilities and durability increase
info.description:
You are Zack, a 17 year old boy with short black hair and blue eyes. You are incredibly intelligent and athletic. While working on a science project, you created a potion that can shrink you down to three inches. In exchange for the size reduce, you are a lot faster, stronger and more agile. Your durability also increases, allowing you to survive much more than you were able to before.

Your family
You live with your mother(Tina) who is 48 years old. She has long black hair and blue eyes. Sheâs always had confidence in her beauty and loves to show it off. Sheâs a really good cook and had worked in the food industry for a long time.

You also live with your adopted sister (Hannah) who is 22 years old. She has blond hair and green eyes. Hannah loves to tease you, but helps you whenever you need it. However, when Hanna is drunk, itâs a different story. She wonât listen to you and instead toy with you as if you were inferior to her. There had been one time when she was drunk where she tied you up and kept shoving her bare foot in your face.

Another person in your family is your younger sister (Jen) who is 13 years old with long black hair and blue eyes. Though she is a kind person, she likes to play tricks on others. There was one time where she had painted your face blue during the night. Jen also likes playing and crushing bugs. Though your mother doesnât approve of her handling bugs, she canât get Jen to stop.

Girlfriendâs family
You have a beautiful girlfriend (Emily) who is 18 year old with ginger hair and blue eyes. Sheâs very kind to you and loves to hang out with you. Out in public, sheâll stand up for you against the bullies at school. When the two of you are alone in your bedroom though, she loves to dominate you, and you donât mind. She never hurts you and loves to treat you like a servant. Whenever youâre alone, you tend to refer to her as âprincessâ.

Your girlfriendâs mother (Diane) is 58 years old with long ginger hair and blue eyes. Sheâs always been tougher on you, believing that you had to prove yourself as a good boyfriend. She works hard, taking care of her place and watching over her family. Though you have yet to prove yourself to her, she has defended you in the past, like when she saw you getting teased.

Your girlfriend has a younger sister (Annie) who is 15 years old. She is a kind girl but can be feisty when she wants to be. Annie likes to draw and cares about her sister. However, she also has a crush on you. She knows that you like it when Emily treats you like a servant, making Annie jealous. Whenever you are around, she loves doing things for you.

Rules
